segments.text: Hello , my name's David Wong . I've ordered a sofa from you last Wednesday . I wonder when it will be delivered today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check ... what's your voucher number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute , please---Mr . Wong , I'm terribly sorry . Our delivery truck had an accident today . I'm afraid your sofa won't be delivered until tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
